markdownRemark.html:
To continue with the climate change topic I posted a few days ago.. I feel obliged to explain further how our species have greatly damaged the world.

We all know these facts from our history classes. We Economies were built in pursuit of power and profit.

A lot of my understanding of the issues in climate change were fortified with my experiences living in the islands for more than a year and understanding the sciences working behind the scene. This is the greatest threat to our existence and I feel the urgency of spreading knowledge and insights.

frontmatter.title: Humans toying with the natural world
